name: Turret Blast
description:
In this game, test your skill and earn some cool skins for your turret along the way!

Controls:

Q - Green Bullet

W - Blue Bullet

R - Red Bullet

E - Shoot

Arrow Keys - Direction

Design Team:

Coding: Leon Lowe

Artwork: Leon Lowe

Music: Harry Simpson

Features:

Puzzle shooter mechanics

Relaxing visuals

Different collectible skins

Reviews:

(Leave a review in the comments section for a chance for it to be featured here)

Donations are not required but are very appreciated. Every bit of money will help this studio grow and make better games.
